Artificial Intelligence (AI)
AI refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to: • Reason: Analyze data, draw inferences, and make decisions like humans. • Learn: Adapt to new information and improve performance over time. • Problem-Solve: Identify and solve complex problems. • Communicate: Interact with humans using natural language or other forms of communication.
Types of AI: • Weak AI — specific tasks • Strong AI — general intelligence • Super AI — surpasses human intelligence
